sentences.english: I dug a hole in the yard to plant the maple tree.
sentences.chinese: 我在院子裏挖了一個洞來種楓樹。

sentences.english: Perhaps a maple forest is but a grand organism composed of lesser organisms.
sentences.chinese: 可能楓樹林是由小生物體組成的巨大的生物體。

sentences.english: It gives the most beautiful maple woven Dahongpao.
sentences.chinese: 它給楓樹織的紅袍最漂亮。

sentences.english: The downtown streets are extremely broad. Booths and maple trees are everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 市區的街道及其寬闊，到處都是售貨亭和楓樹。

sentences.english: And yellow leaves from the maple that lined our street.
sentences.chinese: 是我們的街道上成行種着的楓樹飄落下黃色的葉子。

sentences.english: The brawny big tree had cast a deep impression in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 古楓樹那粗壯厚實的身影已深深地印在我的腦海裏。

sentences.english: Here we see the cherry stock ready to accept the maple and walnut inlays.
sentences.chinese: 這裏我們看到的櫻花股票準備接受楓樹和核桃嵌體。

sentences.english: My new school's name is Maple Ridge Elementary School.
sentences.chinese: 我的新學校的名字叫楓樹嶺學校。

sentences.english: Autumn, a red maple sister falls, as if to meet a good year.
sentences.chinese: 秋天，楓樹姐姐飄落着紅葉，彷彿在迎接豐收的一年。

sentences.english: I still remember that big old tree growing at the gate of my village, which takes three people to embrace.
sentences.chinese: 村莊旁邊就有一株需要3個人才能合抱的古楓樹。

sentences.english: God planted a scarlet maple tree.
sentences.chinese: 上帝栽下了紅彤彤的楓樹。

sentences.english: Withered and yellow leaves from the tree fell down, when most happy that the maple trees.
sentences.chinese: 枯黃的樹葉從樹上掉了下來，這時最高興的是楓樹。

sentences.english: They tapped the sugar maples and the sap began to flow.
sentences.chinese: 他們在糖楓樹上開孔，樹汁便流出了。

sentences.english: Tim had walked into the shade of the maple.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆的身影在楓樹的林陰中消失了。

sentences.english: The palmatisect leaves of the Japanese maple.
sentences.chinese: 日本楓樹的掌狀全裂的葉子。

sentences.english: Maple fruit contains more easily absorbed calcium, promoting bone health of dogs.
sentences.chinese: 楓樹果露中更易吸收的高鈣，促進愛犬骨骼健康。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
